page.title: 12Tenement Housing
page.content:
In Govanhill almost all the housing is tenements, built towards the end of the last century.Today many are being renovated to improve the living conditions.
BEFORE: Dirty stonework. Leaking roofs. Dry and wet root.Some stone blocks rotting. Backcourts dirty and unsafe.Waste storage unsatisfactory. Lack of open space. Some without bathrooms. Unattractive appearance.
AFTER: Sandblasted stonework. Roof repairs. Rot eradication. Replacement of some stonework. Courts grassed and cleaned up. Better rubbish disposal. Play areas and landscaping. Improved amenities. Whole environment is better.
